spatial_accuracy.notes: Main room structure is preserved, but bedroom window and balcony door show alignment issues. The kitchen/utility area lacks the distinct partitioning shown in the floor plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing utility wall partition. Hallucinated a second sink/toilet fixture in the master bath area. Door into the bedroom is missing entirely.

furniture_mapping.notes: Living room sofa configuration changed from L-shape/multi-piece to a single sofa. Dining chairs increased from 3 to 4. Bed orientation is correct but desk is missing.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality isometric rendering, consistent lighting, and clean geometry. Materials are well-represented.

detected_errors.description: Inner door for Bedroom-1 is missing from the rendering.
Utility wall partition between kitchen and laundry area is removed, merging the spaces.
Hallucinated an extra bathroom vanity unit/cabinet in the shower area of Toilet-1.
The balcony sliding door is disproportionately narrow compared to the floor plan.
Entry door swing direction is slightly offset from the plan's 90-degree corner placement.
